mapper.insert: INSERT INTO api_log ( ID, TENANT_ID, USER_NAME, CLASS_NAME, METHOD, TAG, OPERATION, PATH, PARAM, RESULT, CODE, MSG, RESPONSE_TIME, DURATION, IP ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responseTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
